meanings.sent1: The untrimmed bushes in the garden looked messy.
meanings.sent2: Her untrimmed hair flowed freely in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The untrimmed edges of the paper made it look like a wild forest.
meanings.sent4: The untrimmed grass grew like a jungle in the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The untrimmed hedge created a natural barrier between the properties.

meanings.definition: Not having excess or unnecessary parts
meanings.sent1: The untrimmed cake had just the right amount of frosting.
meanings.sent2: His untrimmed speech was concise and to the point.
meanings.sent3: The untrimmed story left out all the unnecessary details.
meanings.sent4: Her untrimmed wardrobe consisted only of essential items.
meanings.sent5: The untrimmed design of the room felt spacious and clean.

meanings.definition: Not having been pruned or cut back
meanings.sent1: The untrimmed rose bushes grew wildly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The untrimmed tree branches reached out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The untrimmed vines twisted and turned without constraint.
meanings.sent4: The untrimmed shrubs blocked the view from the window.
meanings.sent5: The untrimmed hedges provided a natural habitat for birds and insects.
